<title level="1" right="Action">[Drain Bonded Item](/Actions.aspx?ID=2260) <actions string="Free Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Arcane" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=11" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 197 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Frequency** once per day

**Requirements** Your bonded item is on your person.

</column>

---

You expend the magical power stored in your bonded item. During the current turn, you can cast one spell you prepared today and already cast, without spending a spell slot. You must still Cast the Spell and meet the spell's other requirements.
name: Drain Bonded Item
requirement: Your bonded item is on your person.
